00053 
00054 inline G4LorentzVector BDSComptonEngine::GetScatteredElectron()
00055 {return itsScatteredEl;}
00056 
00057 inline G4LorentzVector BDSComptonEngine::GetScatteredGamma()
00058 {return itsScatteredGam;}
00059 
00060 
00061 inline void BDSComptonEngine::SetIncomingPhoton4Vec(G4LorentzVector inGam)
00062 {itsIncomingGam=inGam;
00063  if(itsIncomingEl.e()<electron_mass_c2)
00064       {G4Exception("BDSComptonEngine: Invalid Electron Energy");}
00065 
00066 }
00067 inline void BDSComptonEngine::SetIncomingElectron4Vec(G4LorentzVector inEl)
00068 {itsIncomingEl=inEl;}
